full_summary:
# Open Construction Source List for 15 Wing Moose Jaw

## Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites experienced contractors and suppliers to be included on the Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for the Department of National Defence at 15 Wing Moose Jaw. The OCSL is open for applications and is intended for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required by the Department of National Defence.

## Eligibility and Application Process

Contractors and suppliers interested in being included on the OCSL must submit an application through the MERX portal. The selected language (English or French) for the OCSL will be used for all future tenders and contract documents. A minimum of 10 business days is required for the processing of an application.

## Terms of the OCSL

* The OCSL is intended for construction services with an estimated value of $10 million and below.
* Contractors and suppliers will be invited electronically through MERX to bid on opportunities.
* Tenders will close electronically through MERX.
* Contractors and suppliers who apply to be placed on the OCSL must have an active MERX account to submit electronic bids.

## Contract Terms and Conditions

* Contracts awarded by DCC include measurable performance standards and requirements.
* Contractors that receive an unacceptable or failing score may be removed from the OCSL and receive no further invitations.
* Contracts are subject to DCC's Procurement Code of Conduct.
* Contractors and suppliers may be required to meet organization and personnel security requirements, including Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET.

## Important Dates

* Publication date: December 19, 2022
* Tender closing date: March 31, 2026, at 5:00 PM local time

## Contact Information

For inquiries or to submit a request to be included on the OCSL, please contact:

* Justin Bennett, Defence Construction Canada
* Email: [Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 819-962-2917
* MERX portal: The MERX portal is available at [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply. See [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.
